long_description: Smaller than the size of a standard lighter, the compact Fenix E01 flashlight can be carried along with your keys so you always have a reliable and bright light. Nichia white GS LED outputs 13 lumens and throws a flood beam up to 21m. Simply twist the head of the flashlight to turn it on and off. One AAA alkaline or NiMH battery (sold separately) provides 21 hrs. of operation. Regulated output maintains consistent light output over the lifetime of the batteries. Rugged aircraft-grade aluminum body is designed to resist rolling and has a knurled finish for good grip. Stand the flashlight up on its end on a flat surface to simulate a candle. E01 flashlight has an IPX8 water resistance rating for protection against prolonged immersion in water deeper than 1m (3.3 ft.). Fenix E01 flashlight includes a key ring and a spare O-ring.
short_description: Smaller than the size of a standard lighter, the compact Fenix E01 flashlight can be carried along with your keys so you always have a reliable and bright light.
